attributes.action: Protect pedestrians' rights at sebra crossings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pedestrians of the UK unite! For too long the so-called 'beleagured' motorists have been bullying us. Yet again this morning, a driver revved his engine as I legitimately crossed a sebra crossing - all to often they accelerate towards crossings instead of slowing down. Punish drivers who think they own the roads, instead of sharing them, before there are more senseless deaths.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/VWSmith/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
